courses.title: Money Mission: Build Your Own Business!
courses.description: Learn about money, business, and finance through fun games and activities.

units.title: 📦 Unit 1: Start Your Lemonade Stand!
units.description: Learn the basics of starting a business with a lemonade stand.

lessons.title: 🎯 Lesson 1: What Do You Need to Start?
lessons.description: Discover what items you need to start your lemonade business.

levels.title: 🧩 Level 1: Choose What You Need
levels.description: Select the right items to start your lemonade stand.
levels.objective: Choose the correct items needed for a lemonade stand business.

levels.title: 💰 Level 2: How Much Does It Cost?
levels.description: Estimate the costs of your lemonade stand items.
levels.objective: Make cost estimates for your business items.

levels.title: 💸 Level 3: Where Will the Money Come From?
levels.description: Learn about different ways to fund your business.
levels.objective: Choose how you will get money to start your business.

levels.title: 📝 Level 4: What We Learned
levels.description: Review and recap everything you learned about starting your lemonade stand.
levels.objective: Review the key concepts and steps for starting a business.

lessons.title: 📊 Lesson 2: Manage Your Money
lessons.description: Learn how to organize and track your business finances.

levels.title: 📋 Level 1: Equity & Liabilities Sort
levels.description: Sort items into equity and liabilities only.
levels.objective: Learn to categorize your financial items into equity and liabilities.
